about_the_game: Explore the essence of Sanestone in this 60-page digital album. Dive into the vibrant cityscape, uncovering the motivations and stories of key characters. Each page is a visual treat, offering a glimpse into the life and mysteries of Sanestone. This exclusive artbook is enriching the game's narrative with stunning illustrations and insights.

content_descriptors.notes: sexual acts, nudity, gore, drugs and alcohol, blood and violence.

detailed_description: Explore the essence of Sanestone in this 60-page digital album. Dive into the vibrant cityscape, uncovering the motivations and stories of key characters. Each page is a visual treat, offering a glimpse into the life and mysteries of Sanestone. This exclusive artbook is enriching the game's narrative with stunning illustrations and insights.
name: Paranoid Artbook

short_description: Discover secrets of Paranoid game through captivating artwork in this digital album. Uncover character motivations and the city's vibrant life in each illustrated page,
